return.title: Return Policy
return.description: Our return policy allows customers to return products within a specified period under certain conditions.
eligibility: Products must be returned within 7 days from the date of delivery
Items must be unused, unwashed, and in their original packaging with all tags attached
The product must not be damaged, altered, or show signs of wear
non_returnable: Perishable goods such as food items, flowers, or plants
Intimate or personal care products including innerwear, swimwear, and cosmetics
process: Initiate a return request through our website or customer service within the return window
Once the return is approved, a pickup will be scheduled or you may ship the item back
A refund or replacement will be processed after inspection of the returned item
return.refund_timeline: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after the returned item is received and inspected

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.description: Our refund policy ensures that customers receive their money back for eligible returns and cancellations.
eligibility: A refund will be issued if the return meets the eligibility criteria
For cancelled orders, refunds are processed automatically within 3-5 business days
In case of a failed delivery due to incorrect address or unavailability, refunds may be subject to deductions
modes: Refunds will be credited to the original payment method
If paid via UPI or Net Banking, refunds will reflect in 3-5 business days
For Credit/Debit cards, it may take up to 7-10 business days depending on the bank
non_refundable: Shipping charges unless the return is due to a defect or error on our part
Products marked as 'non-refundable' at the time of purchase

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: Our cancellation policy allows customers to cancel orders before they are shipped.
eligibility: Orders can be cancelled before they are shipped
Once shipped, the order cannot be cancelled but can be returned as per our return policy
process: To cancel an order, go to your order history and click 'Cancel Order'
Alternatively, contact our customer service team within 24 hours of placing the order
Refunds for cancelled orders will be processed within 3-5 business days
cancellation.partial_cancellation: If your order contains multiple items, you may cancel individual items before they are shipped

delivery.title: Delivery Timelines
delivery.description: Our delivery timelines vary based on location and product availability.

standard.urban: 3-7 business days for metro and urban locations
standard.semi_urban: 7-10 business days for semi-urban and smaller towns

express.additional_charges: Express delivery may incur additional charges displayed at checkout

tracking: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking ID via email and SMS
You can track your order in real-time through our website or app
delivery.delays: Delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances such as weather, natural disasters, or high demand periods. We will notify you in case of any delay.
delivery.failed_delivery: If delivery is unsuccessful due to incorrect address or unavailability, the order will be returned to the warehouse. A re-delivery may be scheduled or a refund processed as per our policy.
